Related Character(s): 篎
Связанный символ (и): 篎

彯字的基本解释

彯
piāo
飘带：“撒毡彯为甲。”
〔彯摇〕轻捷；敏捷，如“彯彯武猛”。
飘扬；飘卷：“彯沙礐石。”

彯
piào
　ㄆㄧㄠˋ
图画；彩饰。

彯字的汉语字典释义

[①]［piāo］
［《廣韻》撫招切，平宵，滂。］
(1)飞卷；翻飞。
(2)犹零落。
(3)飘带，绶带。
(4)见“彯摇”。
(5)通“摽”。挥去，弃。

彯字的康熙字典解释

【寅集下】【彡字部】　彯； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页364第14
【廣韻】【集韻】【韻會】?匹妙切，音票。【玉篇】畫也。【集韻】畫飾也。　又【廣韻】撫招切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】紕招切，?票平聲。【廣韻】彯彯，長組之貌。　又與嫖通。【王融·曲水詩序】彯搖武猛，扛鼎揭旗之士。【註】霍去病受詔，與壯士爲嫖姚校尉。

彯字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
彯字的起名意思

暂无。

彯
Basic explanation of words
彯
piāo
Streamer: "Sweeping felt is a piece of armour."
[彯潯] Light and agile; agile, such as "彯彯 martial arts."
Fluttering; Fluttering: "Sand and stone."
彯
piào
ㄆ ㄧ ㄠˋ
Picture; color decoration.
彯
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [piāo]
["Guang Yun" caress and cuts, flat night, stern. ]
(1) Flying roll; turning over.
(2) Still falling apart.
(3) Streamers, ribbons.
(4) See "Xiu Yao".
(5) Through "摽". Wave away, discard.
彯
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Yin Ji 2] [彡字部] 　彯; Kangxi strokes: 14; Page number: page 364 14
[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting]? Miao cut, sound ticket. [Jade articles] Painting also. [Jiyun] also painting decoration.　[Guangyun] [Guang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] [Zheng Yun] Recruiting and cutting,? The ticket is flat. 【Guangyun】彯彯, the appearance of a long group.　 Talk to prostitute again. [Wang Rong·QuShui Poetry Preface] A man who shook the martial arts and uncovered the flag. [Note] Huo Qubing was edicted, and Yao Xiaowei was a prostitute with a strong man.
